TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RSAKeyValue extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: 表示 XML 签名的 <> 元素。

span.span: Represents the <> element of an XML signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 xml `` 数字签名规范定义的 xml 签名的元素。The class represents the `` element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. ``元素是元素的子元素 `` (由 描述公钥的类) 表示 。The `` element is the subelement of the `` element (represented by the class) that describes an public key. ``元素包含与用来对文档进行数字签名的私钥相对应的公钥。The `` element contains the public key that corresponds to the private key used to digitally sign a document. 文档的收件人使用公钥来验证 XML 签名。A recipient of the document uses the public key to validate the XML signature. 如果要将公钥添加到 XML 数字签名，请使用类。Use the class whenever you want to add a public key to your XML digital signature. 如果没有向构造函数显式提供密钥，则将随机生成一个新的 密钥对。If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new key pair is randomly generated. 有关元素的详细信息 `` ，请参阅 [W3C 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about the `` element, see the [W3C specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象生成和验证已封装的 XML 签名 。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify an enveloped XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象生成和验证分离的 XML 签名 。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify a detached XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象生成和验证分离的 XML 签名 。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify a detached XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)]

remarks.format: 基于 W3C 建议[XML 签名语法和处理版本 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212)中[的 rsakeyvalue> 元素](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212/#sec-RSAKeyValue)。Based upon [The RSAKeyValue Element](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212/#sec-RSAKeyValue) in the W3C Recommendation [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Version 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示要使用元素的子元素和子元素添加到 XML 数字签名的公钥 `` `` `` 。The property represents the public key to add to an XML digital signature using the `` subelement and the `` subelement of the `` element. 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 [W3C 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the [W3C specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).

remarks.format: 基于 W3C 建议[XML 签名语法和处理版本 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212)中[的 rsakeyvalue> 元素](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212/#sec-RSAKeyValue)。Based upon [The RSAKeyValue Element](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212/#sec-RSAKeyValue) in the W3C Recommendation [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Version 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212).
